name: William Entriken
role: Lead Author of the ERC 721 Standard
roles: William is a remarkable thinker and a technological leader, an Ethereum blockchain developer and the lead author of ERC-721, which is a technological standard interface protocol for non-fungible tokens, also known as deeds. He is a passionate computer science professional who is helping to bring technology products to market. He has experience in business planning and acquisitions, and is active in researching several computer science topics. As the non-fungibles has been identified as the new driver behind the Blockchain revolution, first example of this are everyone’s favorite CryptoKitties, his fame is rising rapidly and has gained on GitHub, home of more than 20 million developers from all over the world, a cult status.

name: Dr. Moe Levin
roles: Founder of North American Bitcoin Conference
Executive Committee member of Global Blockchain Council

name: Mark Pui
roles: Seed and early stage investor in 0x, Bancor, EOS, QTUM, Tezos and many others

name: Dr. Mitja Pirc
roles: Advisor to multiple blockchain projects, worked with dozens of blockchain projects
Previously Managing Partner at Indigo Consulting, A.T. Kearney, SAS Institute
Focus on strategic advisory, data & analytics, bridging corporate and startup worlds

name: Simon Belak
roles: Tech entrepreneur with a strong focus on data science
Previously held numerous CTO and data-related positions

name: Etiënne vantKruys
roles: His main focus is to help the most promising projects scale and deliver on their promise
